item.description:
Have a long run to get in this weekend?
Kind of tough to enjoy (or suffer through) by yourself?
I propose we gut it out together!!
I'll be posting an invite for a long run each week until early October, join me!!

Email me if you have a route suggestion for this weeks LSD... I've found the run from the Fiedler footbridge, down the Charles and back up the Cambridge side of the river to be a nice route, but I'm flexible. I will post the finalized meeting location Saturday morning.

This week's schedule is a lower mileage week and has me doing 6mi, feel free to add as you wish...

cheers,
jess

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Late Afternoon Long Slow Distance Run
